Is there a simple way to have case sensitivity ignored when the code checks an input?
Posts.HTML:
I'm using the Gamebook.
Is there a simple way to have case sensitivity ignored when the code checks an input?

GetInput() {
if (lcase(result)="hi") {
msg ("Hi back at ya!")
}
else {
msg ("WHAT???")
}
}
lcase converts the result to lower case...
Then compare everything to a lower case answer.
if (lcase(result)="Hi") {
would NEVER work!!!
